article: president bush said thursday that he would team with sen. john mccain to force a crackdown on independent groups spending millions of dollars on political attack advertisements , as the debate over a veterans group 's attacks on sen. john kerry 's war record dominated the race for yet another day .
abstract: bush says he will back mccain on ad crackdown
